page.title: 08NEWCOMERS (continued)
page.content: Mrs.Allies has lived in the area for seven years. She is very much interested in communities. Also she thinks it is a peaceful area and good for bringing up children. The house is fairly new. There used to be two cottages there. Again, she doesn't mind the country smells and if she had a chance to move she would move by the sea. Mrs.Bennett has been living in the area for one year. She used to be a teacher. She lives in a very old house with a crook beam. She also is interested in communities and likes doing mens jobs. She also doesn't mind the country smells. She would like to have a shop and a school nearby.
